content: Putting the large door to the right on pause for a moment, turn your attention to the large valley in the opposite direction where the second Rat Captain patrols. The ridge above is crawling with multiple Rat Archers, plus another Rat Archer on the rooftop to the left will make trying to take him on a pain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
Putting the large door to the right on pause for a moment, turn your attention to the large valley in the opposite direction where the second Rat Captain patrols. The ridge above is crawling with multiple Rat Archers, plus another Rat Archer on the rooftop to the left will make trying to take him on a pain.
